projects_information_list.title: Help Creator
projects_information_list.text: A app that creates titles and descriptions based on media content input developed using IA integration with Node, Typescript, React and TailwindCSS.

projects_information_list.title: Task API
projects_information_list.text: An task management API developed with Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate and Docker.

projects_information_list.title: My notes
projects_information_list.text: A notes app developed with ReactJS, TailwindCSS, Typescript.

projects_information_list.title: Polling API
projects_information_list.text: A polling API developed with Node, Typescript, Fastify, PostgreSQL, Redis, Prisma, Docker.

projects_information_list.title: Weather
projects_information_list.text: A weather data API developed with NodeJS, NestJS, Typescript, PostgreSQL, TypeORM, Docker.
